item.title: About Me
item.description: It’s me, Mehdi Shahdoost. Being a software developer, I have an obsession with technology and coding. Having worked in the software industry for almost two decades, I have encountered a diverse spectrum of technologies, with the Java ecosystem being my primary focus.

item.title: Timed Text Standards
item.description: What’s the Timed Text? Timed text is the presentation of text media in synchrony with other media, such as audio and video. Src W3C standards for Timed text WebVTT = Web Video Timed Text TTML = Timed Text Markup Language WebVTT Format File extension is vtt. This format defines a list of “cues” that have a start time, an end time, and text to display.

item.title: Github Design Philosophy
item.description: Every Hitech company has a set of guiding principles for creating its goods, but sometimes it might be hard to find these philosophies if you don’t work for that company. Github is really different because you can be able to quickly become comfortable with the GitHub design philosophy through an API request. curl https://api.github.com/zen If you use the aforementioned curl command repeatedly, you will receive one philosophy. for instance: Non-blocking is better than blocking.
